name: Barbagiuan
short_description: Deep-fried to golden perfection, these crispy pastries from Monaco are filled with a savory mix of Swiss chard, ricotta, and spices. A beloved appetizer, they offer a delightful taste of Monegasque tradition.

name: Stocafi
short_description: Savor the essence of Monaco with stocafi, a hearty stew of tender dried cod simmered in a rich tomato sauce, infused with garlic, capers, bay leaves, and briny black olives. A true local treasure!

name: Lou fassum
short_description: Originating from Grasse, Lou fassum features tender cabbage leaves enveloping a savory blend of rice, dry-cured ham, and bacon. Slowly poached in aromatic broth, it offers a rich, comforting flavor that warms the soul.

name: Tomates à la Monegasque
short_description: Originating from Monaco, these vibrant stuffed tomatoes combine tender fruit with a savory filling of hard-boiled eggs, tuna, mustard, and creamy mayonnaise, offering a refreshing taste of Mediterranean charm.

name: Oignons Monégasque
short_description: Sautéed pickling onions shine in this Monégasque delight, paired with tangy wine vinegar and rich tomato paste. A versatile side dish that captures the essence of Monaco's culinary charm!
